data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: But what if the morphology of a species was an indicator of the climate it prefers? In ____ case, we ____ be ____ to ____ what ____ it ____ just ____ looking ____ its ____ in ____ fossil ____. One morphological feature commonly used for this purpose is the leaf shapes of plants.
data.partBlankContent: But what if the morphology of a species was an indicator of the climate it prefers? In th__ case, we wo___ be ab__ to te__ what cli____ it inha_____ just b_ looking a_ its rem____ in t__ fossil rec___. One morphological feature commonly used for this purpose is the leaf shapes of plants.
data.answer: 但是，如果一个物种的形态是它所喜欢的气候的指示器呢?在这种情况下，我们可以通过观察化石记录中的它的遗骸来判断它居住的气候。通常用于这一目的的一个形态学特征是植物的叶子形状。
